Ginder es un hombre de 30 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo, Ginder se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Contabilidad, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar con sus pequeños y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Chaufa para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Ginder trabaja como técnico en una empresa de vuelos aéreos de su ciudad, adicionalmente los fines de semana trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, brindando servicios de transporte, él trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Ginder se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de calaminas y madera, lo cuales le servirán de mucho para refacciones el techado de su vivienda, ya que al acercarse las épocas de lluvia desea proteger a su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de convertirse en un gran profesional.
texts.en:
Ginder is a 30 year-old man who lives in the city of Pucallpa with his 2 children, who he loves and who are his main reason for living.  He is a very kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who devotes all of his efforts to getting ahead with his family.  Thanks to his efforts, Ginder is studying for a degree in accounting.  In his free time he enjoys playing with his little ones, and at times he cooks tasty fried rice to share with his family.  

On his own initiative, and with a lot of effort and dedication, Ginder works as a technician in a an airline company in his city.  In addition, during the weekends he works as a moto-taxi driver, providing transportation services.  Ginder works every day for about 10 hours, and he believes that his business is doing well because of his responsibility and because of the friendly service he provides to others.


Ginder is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help they are providing he will be able to buy corrugated metal roofing material and wood so that can repair the roof of his house.  He needs to do this because when the rainy season comes, he wants to protect his family so that he will be able to continue to work and exert himself in order to achieve his greatest dream: to become a great professional.

loans.use: to make some improvements to his house

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 70 años, es casado con Juaquina y tiene 4 hijos quienes son ya mayores e independientes. Vive junto a su esposa en su vivienda hecha a base de material noble que construyó con mucho esfuerzo. Juan tiene un hotel y se inició con este negocio hace mas de 20 años con el objetivo de contar con un ingreso firme para educar y mantener económicamente a sus hijos. Cuando se inició  contaba con 5 habitaciones que solo recibían la visita de algunos viajeros .Con el paso del tiempo contó con la suerte de ver  su distrito crecer económicamente y le permitió mejorar sus ingresos gracias al incremento de huéspedes viéndose en la necesidad de incrementar la cantidad de cuartos y calidad en el servicio que brindaba. 
Considera que es un negocio con el que siente identificado por el gran espíritu acogedor que posee y nunca esta conforme con los servicios que brinda tratando de buscar nuevas maneras de complacer a su clientela.
Este es el tercer préstamo que solicita a su entidad financiera y se muestra muy agradecido por el apoyo que le brindan para seguir adelante. Desea en esta oportunidad con 3,500 soles para realizar la reparación las conexiones de agua del hotel.
texts.en:
Juan is 70 years old. He is married to Juaquina and has 4 children, who are all already grown and independent. He lives with his wife in their house built of quality materials, which he built with a lot of effort. Juan has a hotel. He started this business more than 20 years ago with the goal of having a solid income in order to educate and economically support his children. When he started, he had 5 rooms that were visited only by some travelers. With the passage of time he had the luck to see his district grow economically, and that allowed him to improve his income thanks to the increase in guests, seeing the need to increase the number of rooms and the quality of service he provided.

He thinks that he identifies with this business because of the great welcoming spirit he possesses, and he is never satisfied with the services he provides, trying to look for new ways to please his customers.

This is the third loan he has requested from his financial organization, and he is very thankful for the support that they give him in order to move forward. This time, he would like 3,500 soles to repair the hotel's water connections.

loans.use: to repair the hotel's water connections

loans.name: Doris

texts.en:
Doris is 40 years old. She is a married woman with two children. All her children are in school. She is a petty trader and with the help of her husband, she has been able to rent a shop where she sells tomatoes, oil, beef etc to diffiernt people in her community. 

She is asking for a loan to buy additional items to sell in her store such as rice, eggs, sugar and vegetables.

Doris dreams of moving into a bigger shop in the future and supporting her children in school.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell in her store such as rice, eggs, and sugar
